author: Anna Iovine
title: Pornhub parody Scrubhub features videos about washing your dirty, dirty hands
description: From the minds behind Amazon Dating and Pornhub comes Scrubhub, a safe-for-work parody site that advocates for handwashing: Scrubhub. Scrubhub has a collection of satirical handwashing videos featuring both everyday people and Pornhub models like Asa Akira, a…
content:
From the minds behind Amazon Dating and Pornhub comes Scrubhub, a safe-for-work parody site that advocates for handwashing: Scrubhub. 
Scrubhub has a collection of satirical handwashing videos featuring both everyday people and Pornhub models like Asa Akira,… [+2031 chars]
